title: Ticket #5208: Include changes to build on FreeBSD
description: Jason Bacon has contributed small patches to build on FreeBSD. CLA on file.
remarks:
2015-Aug-08 17:35:17 by tim:
CODE REVIEW: Jason changes look good. However, I did not like the way that he mingled the FreeBSD utmpx changes with the Solaris utmpx code. I modified them to be separate.
